job_tasks.phrase: As Principal Developer, you will be responsible for serving as the technical lead for the three teams.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a leadership role in guiding technical direction and decision-making, which falls under the broader umbrella of software development leadership and technical strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: This means you are the key decision-maker for the future of the product and resolve stalemates in technical decisions.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a core responsibility of a technical lead, involving making critical technical choices and resolving disputes, which is part of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Your HR leadership role for the Channels team involves inspiring the team to grow in their careers and mentoring them in technical expertise.
job_tasks.justification: While HR-related, the mentoring in technical expertise is a direct aspect of leading and developing a software engineering team.

job_tasks.phrase: Of course, in your day-to-day job, you will also be developing.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states that hands-on development is part of the role, fitting the Software Development & Integration category.

job_tasks.phrase: Focus areas of the Channels team include Native Voice (Phone), GenAI, Routing and other innovations.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'GenAI' as a focus area indicates involvement with generative AI models, which falls under AI Specialization tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and maintain software applications using C# for the Mobile Service Cloud product;
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement of traditional software development tasks using a specific programming language.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features;
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of new features into applications through collaboration, a key software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide a technical vision and resolve stalemates for the Core, Channel and Integrations team;
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the technical leadership and decision-making responsibilities within the software development context.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve scalability and maintainability of our products;
job_tasks.justification: Enhancing the technical quality of software products is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay up-to-date with the latest technologies.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, in the context of a developer role, this implies staying current with software development practices and tools.

soft_skills.phrase: As Principal Developer, you will be responsible for serving as the technical lead for the three teams.
This means you are the key decision-maker for the future of the product and resolve stalemates in technical decisions.
Your HR leadership role for the Channels team involves inspiring the team to grow in their careers and mentoring them in technical expertise;
Provide a technical vision and resolve stalemates for the Core, Channel and Integrations team;
Stay up-to-date with the latest technologies.
Focus areas of the Channels team include Native Voice (Phone), GenAI, Routing and other innovations.

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes traditional software development tasks (design, develop, maintain software using C#, improve scalability, integrate features) and technical leadership. While 'GenAI' is mentioned as a focus area for one team, the core responsibilities and technologies described are predominantly software engineering. There are no specific tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG, nor are there mentions of specific GenAI frameworks or models. The role is about integrating or working within an environment that has GenAI, rather than specializing in GenAI model development itself.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software development responsibilities and technical leadership. The mention of 'GenAI' is present but lacks detail regarding specific tasks or technologies related to generative AI model development, making the classification of 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' highly probable but not definitively 'Core GenAI Engineer'.
